00089 {
00090 UINT32 uiCount;

00094       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < SMK_NUM_FLICS; uiCount++)
00095       {

00098                   fFlicStatus=TRUE;             
00099                   if(!fSuspendFlics)
00100                   {
00101                         if(!SmackWait(SmkList[uiCount].SmackHandle))

00107                                                                                                                               SmkList[uiCount].SmackHandle->Height,
00108                                                                                                                               SurfaceDescription.lpSurface,
00109                                                                                                                               guiSmackPixelFormat);
00110                               SmackDoFrame(SmkList[uiCount].SmackHandle);
00111                               DDUnlockSurface(SmkList[uiCount].lpDDS, SurfaceDescription.lpSurface);
00112                               // temp til I figure out what to do with it
00113                               //InvalidateRegion(0,0, 640, 480, FALSE);
00114 
00115                               // Check to see if the flic is done the last frame
00116                               if(SmkList[uiCount].SmackHandle->FrameNum==(SmkList[uiCount].SmackHandle->Frames-1))
00117                               {
00118                                     // If flic is looping, reset frame to 0
00119                                     if(SmkList[uiCount].uiFlags & SMK_FLIC_LOOP)
00120                                           SmackGoto(SmkList[uiCount].SmackHandle, 0);
00121                                     else if(SmkList[uiCount].uiFlags & SMK_FLIC_AUTOCLOSE)
00122                                           SmkCloseFlic(&SmkList[uiCount]);
00123                               }
00124                               else
00125                                     SmackNextFrame(SmkList[uiCount].SmackHandle);
00126                         }
00127                   }
00128             }
00129       }
00130       if(!fFlicStatus)
00131             SmkShutdownVideo();
00132                               
00133       return(fFlicStatus);
